Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item

  • public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Item - a Item in the game. Each 'Item' is an object that the player can take and store and use it. It has a name, a weight and certain items have readable text.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Item(java.lang.String name, int weight)
      Takes parameter name and weight and sets it to the Item.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of the Item.
      java.lang.String getText()
      Returns the text of the item.
      int getWeight()
      Returns the weight of the Item.
      boolean hasText()
      Returns a boolean value to check if the item has a text.
      void setText(java.lang.String speech)
      Sets the text of a the item if the item has a readable text.
